Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.label: Overlord Gunship
Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.description:
In the chaotic skies of GrimWorld 40,000, the Overlord Gunship emerges as a formidable aerial juggernaut. Crafted with an imposing and sleek design, this airborne behemoth symbolizes the Imperium's dominance in the grim expanse of the 41st millennium.

Adorned with battle-worn plating and Gothic embellishments, the Overlord Gunship bears the scars of countless dogfights, a testament to its unyielding role in the ongoing war. Its streamlined silhouette and foreboding presence underscore its status as a symbol of Imperial might.

At its core lies an array of devastating weaponry, each component finely tuned for anti-aircraft and ground assaults. The Overlord Gunship, with its menacing firepower, is a harbinger of destruction against any who dare challenge the supremacy of the Imperium.

As it soars through the turbulent skies, the Overlord Gunship embodies the relentless spirit of the Imperium, a guardian against airborne threats and a symbol of unyielding strength in the perilous theater of GrimWorld 40,000. 

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Driver x1, Passenger x40
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel type:</color> Chemfuel
